structure.unit: A JUSTICE AND PUBLIC SAFETY CABINET

law.catch_line: Earmarking of juvenile justice funding for evidence-based practices.

text.section: Beginning July 1, 2016, fifty percent (50%) of state moneys expended by the department on programs shall be for programs that are in accordance with evidence-based practices.
Beginning July 1, 2018, and thereafter, seventy-five percent (75%) of state moneys expended by the department on programs shall be for programs that are in accordance with evidence-based practices.

law.history: Created 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 132, sec. 4, effective July 15, 2014.
